jobDescription: REQUIREMENTTechnicalTalend and/or InformaticaAWS /CloudHadoop Hive and/or Hadoop Spark  -Tableau and/or OBIEE is a plus  Contract-to-Hire  Supporting Tools Tableau and OBIEE  AWS, HIVE, PIG, Spark Data Engineer II Job Description The Data Engineer is responsible for processing structured and unstructured data, validating data quality, and developing and supporting data products. The Data Engineer also plays a role in Agile planning, providing advice and guidance, and monitoring emerging technologiesWorking experience with Data Integration Tools, such as Informatica, Talend, SSIS.Working experience with Hadoop ecosystem technologies such as Hive, Pig, Spark.Working experience with distributed scalable data stores such as Hbase, Accumulo, Redshift.Working experience with MapReduce-based frameworks.Develops data models to support MDM subject areas.Serves as liaison with Data Stewards, Data Owners and Source Systems to promote growth and adoption of Master Data.Develops BI Subject Areas and all associated objects with BI Tools (OBIEE or Tableau)Working experience in multiple data analytics tools and systems8-10 years of experience in enterprise data warehouse, data lake, data engineering, analytics and data governanceBachelor’s degree in Computer science or equivalentMust be a team playerprovided by Dice Hadoop, Talend, informatica, tableau, OBIEE, Hive, pig, spark, AWS, cloud
